projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Select a project to start working with Claude Code
projects.noRecentDescription: Open a project to get started with Claude Code

settings.title: Settings
settings.errorLoadSettings: Failed to load settings. Please ensure ~/.claude directory exists.

general.heading: General Settings

customTheme.heading: Custom Theme Colors
customTheme.description: Use CSS color values (hex, rgb, oklch, etc.). Changes apply immediately.

coauthored.label: Include "Co-authored by Claude"
coauthored.description: Add Claude attribution to git commits and pull requests

verbose.label: Verbose Output
verbose.description: Show full bash and command outputs

cleanup.label: Chat Transcript Retention (days)
cleanup.description: How long to retain chat transcripts locally (default: 30 days)

general.changesPending: Changes will be applied when you save settings.

analytics.label: Enable Analytics
analytics.description: Help improve opcode by sharing anonymous usage data
analytics.privacy1: No personal information or file contents collected
analytics.privacy2: All data is anonymous with random IDs
analytics.privacy3: You can disable analytics at any time

tabPersistence.label: Remember Open Tabs
tabPersistence.description: Restore your tabs when you restart the app
tabPersistence.enabled: Tab persistence enabled - your tabs will be restored on restart
tabPersistence.disabled: Tab persistence disabled - tabs will not be saved

startupIntro.label: Show Welcome Intro on Startup
startupIntro.description: Display a brief welcome animation when the app launches

permissions.heading: Permission Rules
permissions.description: Control which tools Claude Code can use without manual approval
permissions.noAllowRules: No allow rules configured. Claude will ask for approval for all tools.
permissions.example2: Bash(npm run build) - Allow exact command
permissions.example3: Bash(npm run test:*) - Allow commands with prefix
permissions.example5: Edit(docs/**) - Allow editing files in docs directory

environment.heading: Environment Variables
environment.description: Environment variables applied to every Claude Code session

advanced.heading: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Additional configuration options for advanced users

apiKeyHelper.label: API Key Helper Script
apiKeyHelper.description: Custom script to generate auth values for API requests

rawJson.label: Raw Settings (JSON)
rawJson.description: This shows the raw JSON that will be saved to ~/.claude/settings.json

hooks.heading: User Hooks
hooks.description1: Configure hooks that apply to all Claude Code sessions for your user account.

agents.title: CC Agents
agents.noAgentsDescription: Create your first CC Agent to get started

deleteDialog.title: Delete Agent
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the agent "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the agent and all its associated data.

create.title: Create New Agent
create.description: Configure a new Claude Code agent
create.editDescription: Update your Claude Code agent configuration
create.modelOpusDesc: More capable, better for complex tasks
create.defaultTaskPlaceholder: e.g., Review this code for security issues
create.defaultTaskDescription: This will be used as the default task placeholder when executing the agent
create.systemPromptDescription: Define the behavior and capabilities of your Claude Code agent
create.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

usage.title: Usage Dashboard
usage.description: Track your Claude Code usage and costs
usage.errorLoad: Failed to load usage statistics. Please try again.

sessions.heading: Usage by Session
sessions.noData: No session data available for the selected period

timeline.heading: Daily Usage
timeline.noData: No usage data available for the selected period

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.errorLoad: Failed to load MCP servers. Make sure Claude Code is installed.

agentExecution.taskPlaceholder: What would you like the agent to do?
agentExecution.enterTask: Enter a task to run the agent

hooksDialog.title: Configure Hooks
hooksDialog.description: Configure hooks that run before, during, and after tool executions
hooksDialog.projectDescription: Project hooks are stored in .claude/settings.json and are committed to version control, allowing team members to share configurations.
hooksDialog.localDescription: Local hooks are stored in .claude/settings.local.json and are not committed to version control, perfect for personal preferences.

agentExecution.confirmLeave:
An agent is currently running. If you navigate away, the agent will continue running in the background. You can view running sessions in the 'Running Sessions' tab within CC Agents.

Do you want to continue?
